Description.Name: Give it to me Baby...
Description.Details: The trip down to [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]] was as uneventful as last time. Sumire heads directly to the private landing pad at the Bergan Industires facility. This time, however, you are greeted by a stock standard Bergan Industires Liaison, You don't even catch their name as you board the waiting [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Lore_BerganAPC],APC]]. At least it is the same luxury vehicle as last time, so you pour yourself a drink and sit back enjoying the ride in comfort. You arrive at the facility and are escorted past numerous guards. You can already see an amazing amount of repair work has been completed. You soon arrive at your destination, the same glass walled room that overlooks one of the facility's production floors. You see Alys and [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] standing beside their chairs at the table. Alys smiles at you, "Welcome again to Bergan Industries, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}." You smile at Alys, "Thank you, Ms Poole. And thank you for the tempting offer to test Last Rites here on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]]. Do I understand correctly that you will refit and rearm Last Rites at the conclusion of the exercise?" Alys nods, the smile never leaving her face, "That is correct, Commander. You will not be held accountable for the costs of any damages to your mech or reloading ammo and other consumables, and we will also be covering the costs to the test site, the test units that will be fighting your mech, as well as the rest of the red tape that goes with having a sanctioned test zone on this planet. You really have nothing to worry over and should be free to accept our offer to allow you to test Last Rites under a safe and controlled deployment zone. What do you say?"

Description.Name: Collect pilot and Mech
Description.Details:
You contemplate the option before you for a moment, "Thank you again, Ms Poole, but as generous as your offer is, I must decline.  We have other places we need to be and whilst a controlled cost free test environment sounds interesting, we are prepared to conduct our own tests in the field."

You turn to [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], "It's good to see you again.  You ready to come back to work or have you gone soft loafing around on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]].?"

A sheepish grin crosses [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]'s face and it reddens slightly as he looks from you to Alys and back, "Aff, Commander, and I have been... properly exercising."

Alys stiffles a giggle as she moves over to give [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] a long hug.  She whispers something in {SCN_MW.Det} ear before stepping away and turning to you, "May all your contracts be successful, Commander."

"C'mon, MechWarrior, we have work to do.  Thank you again, Ms Poole."

Description.Name: Live Fire Exercise
Description.Details: You contemplate the option before you for a moment, "Well, when you put it that way, a controlled test environment sounds more interesting." Alys smiles, "Ultimately, this is a way to test that Last Rites functions without any glitches in the field." You look over at [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], "It's good to see you again. What do you think? You ready to get back in a mech or have you gone soft loafing around on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]]?" A sheepish grin crosses [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]'s face and it reddens slightly as he looks from you to Alys and back, "Aff, Commander, and I have been... properly exercising. I am excited to finally get to pilot Last Rites in a real combat scenario." Alys stiffles a giggle as she moves over to give [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] a long hug. She whispers something in {SCN_MW.Det} ear before stepping away and turning to you, "Commander, when you get back to the Argo, you'll find a mock contract available for your eyes only. This will provide the drop coordinates for our testing site located on the other side of the planet." "C'mon, MechWarrior, let's go. Thank you again, Ms Poole." BERGAN INDUSTRIES CONTRACT: LIVE FIRE EXERCISE - LAST RITES, ADDED TO COMMAND CENTER
